alert.note: Alert for Baker County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 4:46PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Baker and north central Malheur Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 446 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brogan, or 27 miles west of Weiser, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Brogan around 550 PM MDT. Brosman Mountain around 620 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Baker County; Malheur County; Oregon Lower Treasure Valley
